Segment¶

class decodes.core.dc_line.Segment(a, b)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_line.LinearEntity

A directed line segment in space.

static by_coords2d(x0=0.0, y0=0.0, x1=1.0, y1=1.0)¶

  • y0 (float) – First y-coord.

static by_coords3d(x0=0.0, y0=0.0, z0=0.0, x1=1.0, y1=1.0, z1=1.0)¶

Returns a 3D LinearEntity from two sets of x,y and z coordinates.

Parameters:
  • x0 (float) – First x-coord.
  • y0 (float) – First y-coord.
  • z0 (float) – First z-coord.
  • x1 (float) – Second x-coord.
  • y1 (float) – Second y-coord.
  • z1 (float) – Second z-coord.
Result :

Segment
inverted()¶

Return a new Segment between the ept and spt of this Segment, but pointing in the opposite direction.

Result :Inverted vector.
Return type:Vec
length¶

Returns the length of this segment.

Result :Length of line segment.
Return type:float
midpoint¶

Returns the midpoint of this segment

Result :Midpoint of Segment.
Return type:Point
near(p)¶

Returns a tuple of the closest point to a given line segment, its t value and the distance from the Point to the near Point.

Parameters:p (Point) – Point to look for a near Point on the Segment.
Result :Tuple of near point on Segment, t value and distance from point to near point.
Return type:(Point, float, float)
